details.title: Parameter Optimization of a Nutation Damper Via the Second Method of Liapunov
details.abstract: The principle of parameter optimization of a linear time-invariant system via the second method of Liapunov is applied to optimize the parameters of a nutation damper suggested recently. Numerical results are derived, and it is indicated that the present values of optimum parameters agree closely with those obtained earlier by an approximate method.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
